text: Kalorama, Washington, D.C. is a quaint little neighborhood in Washington, D.C. and is home to ex-presidents, million-dollar mansions and much more. Its tree- lined lanes can give you a view overlooking Rock Creek Park. You can find some more green space at Kaloroma Park and community gardens. Category:Neighborhoods in Washington, D.C.
title: Kalorama, Washington, D.C.
